name: The Collector (Unnatural Freaks Studio)
description:
Game made during GMTK Game Jam 2022. Theme: "Roll of the Dice."

Behold, my submission to the GMTK Game Jam. Be warned, this is very prototypey. I had limited time to slap together, and kept the UI ugly to focus on having an end of game feature.

I will return to this prototype in a few weeks and update the UI and narrative. Note that there's an error when you return to the main menu, the cursor may not appear. If not, you can press escape to quit (ran out of time to fix that bug).

I hope you enjoy this little exploration experience.

Credits

Bec K - Game Developer

Made in Unity

3D Models: Synty Studios

Music: https://store.johnleonardfrench.com/l/Gqks 

Middleware: Fungus and Unity's Starter Assets Pack

Header and banner art made using MidJourney
